para.text: In order for the applied infiltration to pass through the unsaturated zone, the Newton formulation must be used because the initial head will be below the bottom of the cells in the unsaturated zone. If the Newton formulation is not used, those cells will convert to dry and become inactive. Infiltration applied to inactive cells will be ignored.
Activate the Newton formulation in the "Model|MODFLOW Options" dialog box.
